      • Property Summary

        Properties 
        Name Description
        DateTimeSpan
        Arrival and departure information for the availability query.
        Details
        Type TimeSpan
        Example Value ???
        Required true
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        GuestCount
        The number of guests for this availability search. May optionally include their ages or age categories.
        Details
        Type GuestCount
        Example Value 1234
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 99
        RateRange
        The rate range for which responses should be returned.
        Details
        Type RateRange
        Example Value ???
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        DetailedHotelSearchCriteria
        Detailed search criteria for hotel facilities.
        Details
        Type DetailedHotelSearchCriteria
        Example Value ???
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        RoomTypeCode
        Room type codes for which the search is to be performed.
        Details
        Type Code
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 100
        RatePlanCode
        Rate plan codes for which the search is to be performed.
        Details
        Type RatePlanCode
        Example Value AAAB
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 100
